# See also issue304.txtar

exec hof def 1.cue --outfile 2.cue
exec hof def 2.cue --outfile 3.cue
exec hof def 3.cue
cmp stdout golden1.output

-- 1.cue --
import "example.com/repro/foo"

foo.#Foo

a: "A"

-- foo/foo.cue --
package foo

#Foo: {
	a: string
}

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "example.com/repro"

-- golden1.output --
import "example.com/repro/foo"

foo.#Foo
a: "A"
